short_summary: Renewal for support and maintenance of an EMC unit and related technical specifications
duration_in_months: >},
full_summary:
# EMC Support Renewal for DND
## Government Tender Announcement

### Contract Details

| Field | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Tender Reference Number | SSC-23-00023937:T |
| Solicitation Number | BPM019641/23937 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-10-03T14:00:00 |
| Contracting Entity | Shared Services Canada |

### Contract Description

This solicitation is for the renewal of support and maintenance services for an EMC unit, with related technical specifications. The scope of work includes:

* Support and maintenance services for an EMC unit
* Technical specifications for the unit

### Registration and Submissions

To register and submit a response to this solicitation, please visit the SSC P2P portal at [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login) and click "Register Now".

### Contact Information

* Name: Clara Whittaker
* Email: clara.whittaker@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* Phone: 343-553-8354
* Fax: 343-553-8354
* Address: 180 Kent, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 0B6, Canada

Also, I note that the original text contains multiple language fields (English and French) that are not usable for translation purposes. 

If you need me to translate it, let me know. 

 Best regards.  I can sign with a technical writer's signature if you want.
